titles.title: Lincoln County, Montana, Public Lands Transfer Act of 1993
Lincoln County, Montana, Lands Transfer Act of 1994
Lincoln County, Montana, Lands Transfer Act of 1994
A bill to provide for the transfer of certain U.S. Forest Service lands located in Lincoln County, Montana, to Lincoln County in the State of Montana.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2547)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-748.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-355.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 597.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Vento asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR 10/7/1994 H11425)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 8/25/1994--Passed Senate amended. Lincoln County, Montana, Lands Transfer Act of 1994 - Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to convey: (1) specified lands located within the boundaries of the Kootenai National Forest, Montana, to Lincoln County, Montana; and (2) the timber and mineral rights to specified lands at the new Libby Airport to such County. Requires such lands to revert to the United States if they cease to be used for public purposes unless the Secretary determines that the lands, or any portion thereof, have become contaminated with hazardous substances.
